DownloadSection.description: Available on the App Store and Google Play. Get your username and password through your school, center, or affiliated company.

header.title: Advanced Technology
header.description: At Busway, we work passionately to provide suitable tracking and communication means between service providers and beneficiaries

absence.title: Absence Registration
absence.subtitle: Easy Absence Registration
absence.description: Parents or students can easily register absences through the app if they don't want to take the school bus on any day of the week.

tracking.title: School Bus Tracking
tracking.subtitle: Real-time Bus Tracking
tracking.description: With Busway's real-time tracking service, users can know the actual location of the school bus and the student's location after boarding.

notifications.title: Notifications for Everything
notifications.subtitle: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: With instant notifications and their distinctive tone, you stay continuously updated on everything related to the school bus movement, with automatic alerts synchronized with the bus's actual location.

communication.title: School Communication
communication.subtitle: Direct School Communication
communication.description: With the instant messaging service, students and parents can communicate directly with the school through the app, providing a distinctive and effective communication environment.

FooterSection.tagline: Busway school bus tracking app - towards a safe and comfortable journey for your children
